name: Who has the biggest button ?
description:
WHO HAS THE BIGGEST BUTTON ?

Context / Story :
Made for Global Game Jam 2018. Theme was "transmission". Like always i didn't care.

The game/toy started with a joke with "hmmmmmm" (you'll understand after playing). We talked with hmmmmmm during two days.

I wanted to try another thing with my Microsoft Paint drawings.

The subject takes place the 3rd january 2018 when Mr. Trump replied to Mr. Jong-un :  "I too have a Nuclear Button, but is has a much bigger & more powerful one than his, and my Button works !"

Controls / Advices :

  • You need an Xbox Controler to play with it.
  • Better with Two players.
  • Much better with second degree
  • Much much better with love
